name: Unfinished Business (Don6l)
description:
Dear spirit … I regret to inform you that you are dead.

You may not recall the specifics, but rest assured - it was, indeed, a murder most horrid! Now, the truth must be told. This is your unfinished business.

While your body lies right where you left it, your spirit is free to explore the surrounding area and haunt various artifacts. But take heed - by sunrise, your powers will be no more.

What’s this? A young stranger has dared to trespass upon this haunted abode! Perhaps you can lead him towards the scene of the crime, but be warned - he has a mind of his own, feeble as it may be, and his reactions may be out of your control.

Good luck, spirit!

How to play

Use your ghostly powers to interact with specific objects to guide Brock to your body before sunrise.

Move Camera with WASD.

Rotate Camera with RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON or Q & E.

Trigger Interactable Objects with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

NOTES

This game was made in participation of GMTK 2020 Jam. As a result some bugs made it into the final build. The audio for the grandfather clocks used to scare Brock does not work. Use the clocks to frighten Brock when he gets close to make him run in your desired direction.
